hero.headline: Experienced Mathematics Teacher for
hero.subtext: Empowering students through CBSE, ICSE, and State Board curriculums. Available for both personalized online sessions and offline classroom coaching.
hero.quote: Making mathematics simple, one concept at a time.

about.label: About Me
about.title: Passionate Educator & Math Enthusiast
about.bio: With over two decades of experience, I specialize in transforming the way students perceive Mathematics. My journey has been dedicated to breaking down complex equations into understandable concepts, fostering a genuine love for the subject.

highlights.title: Academic Record
highlights.description: Consistent track record of improving student grades and conceptual clarity.

highlights.title: Problem Solving
highlights.description: Focus on building analytical skills that extend beyond the classroom.

featureCards.title: Conceptual Foundation
featureCards.description: Strong emphasis on the 'Why' before the 'How'.

featureCards.title: Exam Strategies
featureCards.description: Techniques to manage time and maximize accuracy.

featureCards.title: Interactive Learning
featureCards.description: Active participation to ensure real-time doubt clearing.

featureCards.title: Regular Assessment
featureCards.description: Weekly tests and progress tracking reports.

steps.title: Assess
steps.description: Understanding the student's current proficiency level and learning style.

steps.title: Plan
steps.description: Creating a customized lesson plan tailored to board requirements.

steps.title: Execute
steps.description: Interactive teaching with real-world examples and visualization.

steps.title: Review
steps.description: Continuous feedback loop through tests and homework analysis.

classes.title: CBSE Board
classes.description: Focus on NCERT curriculum, Exemplar problems, and Board pattern questions.

classes.title: ICSE Board
classes.description: Comprehensive coverage of Selina/Concise Math with emphasis on logical steps.

classes.title: State Board
classes.description: Aligned with State SCERT guidelines focusing on core fundamentals and exams.
